summary: Feature request to provide direct access to the Temporal-created workflow and activity instances from their respective contexts, enabling developers to interact with the instance objects directly rather than through the context abstraction alone.
userImpact: Developers would gain programmatic access to workflow and activity instances from their contexts, improving the developer experience and enabling more flexible use cases.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented providing access to workflow and activity instances through their respective contexts.
keyQuote: Provide access to the Temporal created/owned workflow and activity instance from their respective contexts.
